I actually like the idea of more intensity as well, but I am sure as
has been pointed out, it may compete with this already established PBEM
and it will stretch us out more then some of us can handle. Are there
players from other places who may want to come as well? The larger the
player base, the more interesting and varied things become. 

Preston

--- khamkain <kham31@...> wrote:

> This sound nice. i like the idea of a more intese conflict between
> the
> factions and of course Cybetron. I would probably participate since I
> don't have a lot pf character here.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "xochitla2006" <xochitla2006@...>
> wrote:
> >
> > I like the idea but it wont be NCW a competidor of NBW?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Sounds like a lot of time and effort.  But if you guy's decide to
> 
> > start one,
> > > I can restructure the wiki to accomodate a second RPG.
> > > Not sure I'd have time to participate in it though, I'm already
> in 
> > 2 PBEM
> > > groups, not sure adding a third would be possible for me.
> > > -Kraftlos
> > > 
> > > On Feb 1, 2008 11:05 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@> wrote:
> > > 
> > > >   I would LOVE to, however I am stretched to my limit here. I 
> > would have
> > > > to let these NPC's I control fade back into the background of
> the 
> > moon,
> > > > and just keep Myrmidon active. I have no problem with that, but

> > > > firepower. :)
> > > >

> > > > --- Richard Allen <roborick007@ <roborick007%40yahoo.com>> 
> > wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > How many members here would be interested in starting a
> sister 
> > RPG to
> > > > > branch off of NBW? Sometime ago I started the story arc of 
> > having a
> > > > > third Great War break out on Cybertron between the Maximals
> and
> > > > > Predacons as well as any remaining Autobots and Decepticons. 
> > Plus
> > > > > there is the G2 Decepticons attacking future Earth. I figure
> we 
> > could
> > > > > do a RPG set in either of these battles. This would allow for
> 
> > new
> > > > > characters to be created and bring the NBW universe to a
> wider 
> > scale.
> > > > >
> > > > > I like the idea of having it mostly based on Cybertron with 
> > maybe
> > > > > little threads branching off to the G2 conflict on Earth.
> > > > >
> > > > > I would put the RPG on Yahoo groups and have it run the exact
> 
> > same
> > > > > way as NBW.
> > > > >
> > > > > So get back to me. Who wants the Neo Cybertron Wars RPG?
